# The `RecordVal` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class represents a field in a record, including its name, type, value, and source location. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::RecordVal</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class represents a field in a record, including its name, type, value, and source location.

  prototype="void llvm::RecordVal::setUsed (bool Used)"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Whether this value is used.

Useful for reporting warnings, for example when a template argument is unused.
